excerpt: This vegan coconut curry tofu is a perfect meal for a quick weeknight dinner!

instructions.name: Instructions for Curry Sauce
instructions: In a medium bowl, whisk together coconut milk and curry paste until completely combined.
Add vegan fish sauce, brown sugar, lime juice, and soy sauce and mix well.
Stir in 1/2 cup of water and mix well.

instructions.name: Instructions for Tofu
instructions: Heat vegetable oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add garlic and ginger and stir-fry for 30 seconds.
Add tofu and stir-fry until lightly browned and crispy.
Remove the tofu from the pan and set aside.
In the same pan, add bell pepper and red onion and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes until slightly softened.
Add the curry sauce to the pan and stir to combine with the vegetables.
Add the tofu back to the pan and stir to coat with the curry sauce.
Heat until the sauce is hot and bubbly.
Serve hot topped with fresh chopped cilantro.
